title: CFTRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Associate Posts
description: Central Food Technological Research Institute (CFTRI) has announced the official notification for 2025. Allotted 02 vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.Sc, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the CFTRI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
